title: The Water taxi is a must!
text: Loved the water taxi from Calis Beach to Fethiye. It only cost about £1.20 and was well worth the money. Ok, the bus is cheaper but for the views, lovely breeze and pure relaxation it is well worth the small extra cost. The water taxi runs every 30mins and provide drinks etc if required, if you’re in Fethiye give it a go!

title: Water taxi 100% recommended!
text: Loved the water taxi from Calis Beach to Fethiye. It only cost about £1.20 and was well worth the money. Ok, the bus is cheaper but for the views, lovely breeze and pure relaxation it is well worth the small extra cost. The water taxi runs every 30mins and provide drinks etc if required, if you’re in Fethiye give it a go!

title: Lovely hotel with hard working staff
text:
This hotel is fantastic!
Everything you need in one resort.
The family room was huge and cleaned everyday if required.

Staff are working so hard ensuring that COVID-19 safety is their number 1 priority.

The spa was very relaxing and John is a great asset to the spa team ensuring that the perfect massage was given.

My only gripe is the sun beds. There just wasn’t enough. Staff told me that we had to put out towel down between 6am and 7am to ensure a bed. This was uncomfortable with me and didn’t seem fair to others.
I feel if they could safely fit in more sun beds around the pool then they should somehow do this.
Apart from this, loved the hotel, pool, food, water sports, staff and entertainment (especially Tarzan who even got me up taking part in Zumba) were brilliant!

Would we come again.....too right we would!

title: Stanhill is open and ready for us!
text:
We decided to treat ourselves to a night away on the first day the hotel had reopened following the lockdown changes
Staff were friendly and welcoming and made our stay very relaxing.
All the social distancing and hygiene regulations were adhered to by staff including hand sanitisers located around the hotel.
The hotel looked amazing and the 3 course dinner was just perfect at a very reasonable price.
Well done and thank you to all the staff at the hotel.
I can 100% recommend this hotel and will not hesitate in staying here again in the near future.

title: Hilarious!
text:
A comedy about a bank robber is brilliant! So funny and just amazing the way the show is presented. Thinking about taking the children as I’m sure they will find it just as fun as we did.
100% recommended!

title: It’s a definat yes from me!
text: Oh wow....There’s not many traditional Greek places to eat where I live (Reigate, Surrey) so after a google search we found Andy’s Taverna in Camden. I am so glad we went there. The food was amazing and staff were so welcoming. I can 100% recommend this restaurant!!

title: Amazing choice of food and
text:
Amazing choice of food and the quality was perfect for the family to chose.
Staff were quick to tidy your plates. I would definitely come back again

title: Not bad at all!
text:
Stayed at the premier inn for 2 nights and went for breakfast on both mornings.
Plenty of food and it tasted yummy!

title: Perfect location, perfect price, perfect hotel!
text:
Stayed here for 2 nights for a wedding. The hotel is perfect and central for all our needs.
Staff were amazing and helpful also provided an ironing board and iron when required.
The price was also excellent (when booked in advance)
Would definitely stay again!

title: A quick meal before the Airplane
text:
Ok, so we went to McDonald’s before going to the airport.
Food is....McDonald’s. Nothing new, however compared to the UK, it’s not cheap. 8 euros for a big tasty meal!
The view upstairs is lovely, however being charged 20cents for ketchup makes me give this a 4 star review.
Would I go back....it’s McDonald’s I guess so!

title: Beautiful hotel and total relaxation
text:
This was our first Hilton holiday (outside the UK and USA)

The hotel is amazing, staff are very attentive and polite and are always will to assist with anything we required.

There are 4 large outdoor pools (fun pool, over 16’s pool, family pool and quiet pool) and there were always sun beds available at one of the pools. Staff even assist you find a sunbed or move the sun shades if required.

The room was very tidy and in very good condition with lovely views of the Marina. (Or pools)

The only down side was a couple of silly mistakes made by staff...we were given a room to go to when we arrived from London only to find people In the room and the room allocated to another family.

The second mistake was I was charged 700 euros for the hotel, when I had already prepaid for the hotel! (In other words charged twice)

Staff were very apologetic and Front office Manager Andrea Farrugia rectified this and ensured I was not out of pocket.
These are just silly mistakes that a 5* hotel should not be getting wrong!

Apart from the above I am still going to give Hilton Malta 5 stars and I would still definitely return and recommend the hotel to anyone wishing to attend.

Forgot to mention.....breakfast and dinner was out of this world!!

title: Lovely hotel and perfect location
text:
This was our first visit to Derby whilst going to Alton Towers.
The hotel is just perfect. A very short walk to the bus station that gets you to the theme park (X52) and staff make you feel very welcome.
Excellent price and plenty to do in derby for meals out / drinks etc
Would definitely come back again!
place: Premier Inn Derby City Centre (Riverlights) hotel

title: Anniversary visit
text:
My wife surprised me with a visit to the Woodlands Park Hotel.

The grounds are beautiful and the bedroom was lovely. Most staff were very attentive and I would say the only down side was asking bar staff repeatedly for the same item (packet of crisps) at the bar. Apart from that champagne and chocolates made our stay that extra bit special!
Thank you for a lovely stay at your hotel!

title: As always, lovely food and service
text:
Having Nando’s in Reigate is just amazing!
The new location is perfect. Lots of seating, staff are friendly and the food is up to the usual brilliant Nando’s standard!

title: Beautiful
text:
This place is a little gem hidden in a busy city!
A great place to escape the Athens noise. I would recommend this as a place to visit!

title: 10 out of 10 again!
text:
This is our 2nd time coming to the restaurant and the food here is amazing!
The atmosphere is buzzing and the service from the waiter was friendly fly and welcoming.
Not the cheapest of meals but I guess you are in the city centre close to the Plaka stairs and acropolis!

title: Expensive and slow
text:
We eat at different Wetherspoons throughout the year/country.

The service here was frustratingly slow, I don’t know why as the place wasn’t busy at 6am.

We were after a quick meal but this didn’t happen. Made me late for a flight grrrrrr

Prices are ridiculously high for breakfast and I’m not sure if I’ll go back again in August.

Sham, I normally love Wetherspoons!

title: Not too bad at all!
text:
Lovely burger, pudding and drinks!
I feel it is a little pricy but hey, we’re in Reigate!
Would I go again....probably!

title: Busy but always worth it!
text:
I think my title says it all!
This is my 3rd year returning to Athens and my 3rd trip to the acropolis.
I love the views and the walk up the plaka stairs.
I guess, see you again next year!!

title: Stunning views
text:
What an amazing view!
We came here not expecting too much, however it was well worth the trip. Stunning views and history all rolled into one.
I would definitely come back again!!

title: Fast and reliable
text:
It is so easy on the tram from the airport!
Reasonable prices and they run every 7 minutes.
Best way to travel from airport to city centre!

title: Recommended by locals and so glad we were!
text:
Yep, recommended to come here from a local whisky shop. I was so pleased we did. The cafe didn’t look much from the outside, however once the food arrived it was lovely. Food was very reasonably priced and the flavours were amazing!
Staff were friendly and I’ll definitely be going back when I am next in Scotland!

title: So many whiskys!
text: Yep the title says it all. There were so many types of whisky to chose from. Prices aren’t cheap but staff make you feel welcome and I really enjoyed our time here. Came here 6 years ago and will probably be back when I’m next here again!

title: Perfect location!
text:
Probably my best premier inn!
Staff were very welcoming and though we arrived early, they made sure there was a room available following a long trip to Scotland.

Breakfast was scrummy and the location was perfect for the Royal Mile (and everything else in Edinburgh)
I’ve already booked my return for November 2019!!
place: Premier Inn Edinburgh City Centre Royal Mile Hotel

title: Love it and will be going back...again and again!
text:
What a lovely shop. Staff were amazingly knowledgeable about whisky and made us feel very welcome allowing us to try different products.
Several drams later (3 hours!) we purchased 3 bottles to take back to London!

Thank you for a fab time and we will be back soon!

title: Brilliant venue
text:
What a brilliant Jazz bar!
The music varied and admittedly the music was initially a bizarre kind of Jazz, but once one band had finished the next one was amazing!
Prices were very reasonable compared to London and staff were friendly!
For the record I didn’t see any mob activity as per the earlier review by someone!

Fab night...thanks!

title: Fantastic food!
text:
What a lovely meal out. Food was the usual amazing taste the tgi’s give you. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
My only gripe was....the steak knife I was given was blunt. I asked for another, and was told there wasn’t any. The chef offered to cut the steak for me. I politely declined!!
Please sharpen the steak knives!!

title: Great staff and breakfast was Mmmmmmm
text:
I last came to this Hilton nearly 20 years ago for a work do. I thought I’d try it again.
Staff were very welcoming, polite and 100% professional!
The outside of the hotel looks ok, but the inside they really have updated. The king room looked amazing and was very relaxing with a huge bed. The breakfast was scrummy with a large choice of food.
My only gripe....where were the mushrooms? The chef said “it’s complicated” not sure what that meant?!
Anyway...a fantastic night away. Thank you!

title: Perfect venue
text:
Wow what an amazing venue! The food was out of this world and staff made us all feel very welcome.

I’ll definitely be visiting again soon!

title: Stunning stunning stunning!
text:
The minster is well worth a visit and is just amazing. We attended a christening and the female vicar was so welcoming and friendly.
I wish she was our local vicar as the Baptism was perfectly pitched for families and young people. She is a real cool asset to the Church of England!

title: Why the negative reviews?
text:
Coming from London where I have been to many Wetherspoons, Beverley have a stunning bar at The Cross Keys.
We came for breakfast and the food was 10 out of ten.
The bar is stunning different from the usual Wetherspoons brand and staff were kind and helpful.
I would definitely be going back again soon!

title: Lovely hotel, but.....
text:
I loved the hotel, staff were excellent, the location was perfect for a christening at the minster, breakfast was well worth the money, the only but is....the heating in the room was way to warm. You can’t open the window and the lowest temp the air con would go was 19.
The room was stuffy and way to warm. It appears other rooms were the same as there was a large party if us staying at the hotel!
Apart from that, the hotel was perfect and I’d probably go there again next time I’m in Beverley.
place: Premier Inn Beverley Town Centre hotel

title: Always lovely!
text:
Stunning classic hotel in Brighton and directly opposite the seafront.
The views are amazing from the King suite and the breakfast was to die for!
This is my 3rd visit to the hotel and I look forward to coming again soon.

title: Fab night and fab Christmas do!
text:
As a party of 14 we came to the Greek vine for our Christmas do.
What a brilliant night!
Dancing, Greek food and the staff are truly amazing, what more could we ask for.
If you want a quiet romantic night on a Friday or Saturday, this is NOT the place to go. If you want fun, party and great atmosphere, The Greek Vine IS the place to go!
Thanks for making our night fab!!

title: Totally amazing
text:
Wow what a show!
Wasn’t sure what to expect as there was no story line. In short, who needs a story line when this amazing show is performing.
The music, dance and band were totally amazing!
We were front row and loved every minute of it!
Thank you for making my boys 13th year old birthday treat so special!

Highly recommended!!

title: Wow wow wow
text:
This place is lovely! At first I thought it was going to be an overpriced cafe that sells coffee and cake. Boy I was wrong....a large menu of food and drink including hot meals.
The pizza was scrummy and reasonably priced.
A lovely lunch and I will definitely be returning!

title: Yep it’s a 3 star!
text:
The outside looks amazing, the lobby looks amazing, sadly the room looked shabby and tired.
The toilet seat wobbled on the floor and was clearly not fitted to the floor, the room just looked so tired and in need of love and life.
The air conditioning was switch off or faulty, which meant we had to open the windows. Friday night in Hull is Noisy and at 2am the noise of clubbers outside was annoying!

Breakfast seemed massively over priced at £20 for one adult and one child per night. We went to Wetherspoons across the road £3.95 for a full fry up!
It’s so sad that this hotel has so much potential but is so let down by the rooms.
I’m just glad I got 2 nights free from my avios points as I wouldn’t want to pay the hote price when there’s a holiday inn or Hilton next door!!

title: Lovely restaurant
text:
What a lovely meal. Staff are friendly and were all over my friends 3 month old baby!
The food was fabulous and in all it was a great early evening meal.
If I had to pick a negative, it would be that staff were too nice. What does that mean I hear you say?!
Someone on a nearby table had a problem with their meal, different staff apologised to them several times and I could see this irritating the customer.
Apart from this (which didn’t bother me) it was a great evening meal!

title: Lovely lovely lovely!
text:
After finding this property on Booking.com we went there with an open mind. Well as a family of 4 we loved it!
The swimming pool is just the right size for the property and there is a hot tub you can use as well (not required in August)
The rooms were on-suite and the kitchen was clean and just perfect. It’s a shame the photos on the website do not do this place justice!
Much better in real life!!

title: An excellent day out!
text:
This was our last day in Cyprus and we decided to spend it at Fasouri water park.
I was a little unsure at spending the advertised €30pp for 4 people, however when at the till the lady only charged me 65 euros for everyone!
That started the day off well!
In short the family had a great time! We loved the slides and will be definitely returning when we come back to Cyprus!

title: Massive Mall
text:
Yep, it’s a Mall and it’s HUGE.
Loads of shops and even a sports direct for the English visitors!
Food Hall was slightly over priced, however the air conditioning was well worth the visit!

title: OMG
text:
Wow...this place has changed massively since I last was here (about 20 years ago)
Posh shop, massive boats and a vast amount of houses/hotels (even an island!)

Do I like it.......Yes it must be great for the Cypriot economy, however I do miss the traditional small boating marina!

Oh well times must change!!

title: Love it!
text:
What an amazing beach. Beautiful sand, reasonably priced places to eat and only 2.50 Euro for sun bed and parking is the same for the whole day!
The water is clear and the sea isn’t too deep so is great for children.
This beach was so good, we came back 2 days later!
Yes there are aeroplanes Landing nearby however very little noise can be heard....personally I just think this adds to the amazing atmosphere!
Would defiantly recommend.

title: McDonald at the foot of the mountains!
text:
I can’t believe they’ve put a McDonald’s in Skarinou!
Despite my reluctance...the air conditioning was welcomed and the food was.....McDonald’s. Does the job and fills you up!

title: Lovely food...just a little slow to arrive
text:
The food is out of this world. Grilled in front of you and looked amazing. The only downside was because it was busy it took 70 minutes for the food to come to our table. Apart from the long wait, I would definitely recommend this place to eat.
By the way.....cash only no cards!

title: Amazing history!
text:
The children and I loved this place. The historic ruins are amazing and the views are spectacular!
It does get hot and thankfully ice cold drinks are only 1 Euro each and water 50cents!
I would highly recommend coming here!

title: Just as I remember it!
text:
I have been coming to this restaurant several times over the past 40 years.
The food is out of this world! The meze food just kept coming and each plate was getting tastier.
Staff were attentive and very polite.
I’ll be coming back again In a few days time before i travel back to England.

60 euros to feed 4 including the 2 Rounds of drinks and so much food we were allowed to take take it back to our villa, which made a lovely lunch the following day!

title: Beautiful settings and amazing food!
text:
This is a beautiful taverna set in a small village (kato drys) Which locals use on a regular basis. As a child I always use to come here with my family and enjoyed the food.
40 years later and I still thoroughly enjoy the food, scenery and atmosphere.

Those that expect the full menu may be a little disappointed as this is a village taverna and not everything is available every night! Go with the flow and enjoy what they offer! I’ll continue to come here on my holidays and will always look forward to eating at Platanos!

title: Negative reviews...
text:
We popped in for a drink and a Cypriot pudding.
Not sure why there are so many negative reviews. Staff were polite and friendly, drinks were slightly more than elsewhere, however the views outside are amazing so well worth the extra 50 cents each!

4 euros for 2 soft drinks...I’ve paid a lot Mrs In other countries!

title: Lovely relaxing hotel
text:
We came here for our wedding anniversary and the hotel done everything they could to make this special.
Lovely room, amazing staff, petals on the bed and dinner table. It was a brilliant anniversary stay.

There was a prom at the hotel, but we couldn’t hear any noise and we didn’t even know they were there!

I can 100% recommend this Hilton and will definitely be returning.

Thank you for making our night special!

title: Father’s Day meal
text:
What a lovely meal.....it’s probably been 25 years since I last went to Chiquito’s Leicester Square.
The food at Crawley was amazing, the portion size was substantial, the price was a little high (thank goodness for the 30% off voucher!)
The cheesecake was out of this world!

I definitely won’t be waiting another 25 years for my next one!

title: Oh wow...that was good!
text:
Yep....the burger was so good I actually wanted to go back the following day!
First time visit and I can’t believe I haven’t been before. The burger tasted fantastic and the atmosphere was out of this world.

My only gripe was the cost of a small bottle of diet coke....£3, where by if it was £2 I would of purchased 2 bottles, instead I just had the one!

Apart from the above I will definitely return soon!

Thank you!

title: Amazing hotel!
text:
I absolutely loved this hotel. 2 nights in the family room with breakfast, lunch and Dinner included.
The room size was amazing and the food quality was out of this world!
The pool was cold (as it was April) but we still went in!! (Typical Brits)
Evening entertainment was also excellent!

I had previously stayed at Aqua Montague, but truth is...I think this is the better hotel!

Would I go again....I sure would!

My only negative...dinner drinks are a little pricey and I was told off for bringing a small bottle of water to the table!

Apart from the above...fantastic hotel, thank you!

title: My son loved it!
text:
Ok, so it is a little pricey, however you really do get value for money!
My son loved the tour and was so pleased to be at this famous stadium!

I can highly recommend this tour. Just a shame the VR headset was an additional fee on top of the entrance fee.

title: Lovely afternoon tea
text:
We were welcomed by staff at the door and shown to the fire place where there was a yummy afternoon tea waiting for us.
It was so so nice! Staff were excellent, attentive and welcoming!
The food was so tasty and fresh and topped off by beautiful surroundings!
Would I go back for afternoon tea?? Oh yes!!

title: Prices...what have you done?
text:
I think my title says a lot. For some reason each dish has gone up between 50p and £1 so my average meal use to cost £21 now with the price increase comes to £26!
I’ve been eating here for many years, however sadly with this increase, I’ll now be ordering less times and possibly looking elsewhere. This is such a shame as I liked it here!
When will businesses realise, charge a little less and your customers will come more often...charge more and guess what, they will not come!

title: Not the best, but still not bad
text:
I think my title says it all.
This is my 5th year of Wimbledon Panto and though we enjoyed the show, it felt like it didn’t flow like previous years.
There was a lot of Al Murray stand up comedy (which was great) but when he and others went into the audience we couldn’t see anything (we were in the dress circle)
Maybe a camera showing us would of been good!
The other negative was £5 for a slush puppy drink. Yes I know it was in a fancy container, but all I wanted was a normal drink at a normal price.
Apart from this, the kids enjoyed most of it and the helicopter and 3D Show were the main parts that made the show unique!

Will I be there next year?? Of course I will but, I do hope they get it right!

title: A yes from me
text:
I do like 5 guys. It just tastes yummy!

The only negative from me is the expensive price. £39 for 3 burgers, 1 large chips and 2 drinks!
